member.summary: Ids for nodes which match quick search filter

member.name: T:JetBrains.dotCover.Workspace.Impl.Reporting.Model.Html.FileExistenceAnalyzer
member.summary:
Checking for file existence takes about 10ms. In ReSharper snapshot we have info about 15000 files. This means that total time consumption for this operation is about 2 minutes.
This class is introduced to minimize number of checks where possible (e.g. if source files are unavailable)
